build-items.action-name: Install a Custom Terraform Version for CloudBolt
build-items.name: Install a Custom Terraform Version for CloudBolt

description:
Install a custom version of Terraform.

Provide a version of Terraform, a Zip URL + custom version number.

. The new version can be set as the Global Default in the Admin Miscellaneous Settings.
name: Install a Custom Terraform Version for CloudBolt
